format: JavaScript (Vite configuration in ES module syntax)
description: This file is a Vite configuration script for a React-based frontend project called Chronose Frontend. It imports plugins, sets environment variable loading rules, and configures dev server and preview settings, including environment variable handling and file ignore patterns.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines and exports the Vite configuration object, accepting a function that receives environment mode.

methods.name: loadEnv
methods.description: Loads environment variables based on the current mode, filtering by a specified prefix ('REACT_APP_').
